[+875] Valve will be releasing Alien Swarm for free July 19th!
item.description: Valve has announced that they will be releasing the game, Alien Swarm along with the complete code base FREE-OF-COST via Steam.

item.title: [+788] Can You Hear Goldman Sachs Laughing?
item.description: After a big wind-up, the SEC is essentially allowing Goldman Sachs to redeem itself for the price of a few days' revenue. This is toothless financial reform.

item.title: [+746] Vatican: Female priests as bad as pedophiles
item.description: The Vatican has classified the "attempted ordination" of women as one of the most serious crimes a Catholic priest can commit, putting it on a par with paedophilia, heresy and desecrating the Sacrament.

item.title: [+732] Ambition (PIC)
item.description: This little guy sure has eyes bigger than his stomach...

item.title: [+722] The More You I Look At It The Funnier It Gets [PIC]
[+709] The Truth About The War On Drugs (Infographic)
item.description: The War on Drugs is one of the longest and most expensive war ever fought by the United States. Billions of dollars are spent, thousands of arrests are made and countless lives are lost in the name of keeping illegal drugs off the streets. It’s no secret that it’s a war the government is not winning.But is it a war they should even bother fighting?

item.title: [+696] Man Forced to Marry Girlfriend
item.description: This is the most reluctant groom I've ever seen.

item.title: [+692] Study Finds Conservatives Hate to Be Told to Conserve Energy
item.description: Utilities hoping to nudge customers to conserve energy by telling them how much they and their neighbors consume may want to consider customers' political leanings first: that tactic tends to backfire with conservatives, a recent study suggests. Democrats were more likely to lower their energy use, while conservatives actually increased theirs.

item.title: [+619] Drinking While Riding A Pig [GIF]
item.description: This little piggy went to the market, this little piggy stayed home. This little piggy had roast beef, this little piggy had none. And this little piggy cried... "Get this drunk bastard off my back!"

item.title: [+613] Thus ends the greatest ad campaign in internet history (vid)
[+550] Atheists Use Blow-Dryers to De-Baptize
item.description: Nonbelievers Adopt Provocative Ceremony to Make a Point About Baptism

item.title: [+471] Top 50 Most Desirable Arab Women of 2010 [Pics]
item.description: Here are pictures of top 50 most beautiful and desirable Arab celebrities. We have compiled this list with popularity, talent, charm, sense of style and most web searches of these Arab women.

item.title: [+468] 5 Days Undercover as a Justin Bieber Fan
item.description: As an Internet writer, it's my job to have at least some kind of working knowledge of the stuff people are into these days, but sometimes, shit just escapes me. Justin Bieber is one of those things.

item.title: [+468] Pink Gets Tossed Offstage At Concert (Video)
item.description: Finally, Pink knows what it feels like to listen to one of her songs!

item.title: [+457] 10 Worst Video Games Ever Made (w/Videos)
item.description: It takes a special kind of failure to make it into this list. A game has to be more than boring or poorly executed. To become one of the 10 Worst, it starts as a bad idea and ends by actually lowering the quality of life of people who haven’t played it.
